definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drop, drip (WisdLt.) (NH id. ([[זלף]] more common), [[דֶּלֶף]] through, etc., Aram. [[דְּלַף]], dlap, drip)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[אֶל־אֱלוֹהַּ דָּֽלְפָה עֵינִי]] Job 16:20 i.e. weeps (drops in tears); [[דָּֽלְפָה נַפְשִׁי]] [[מִתּוּגׇה]] Ps 119:28 i.e. weeps (itself away Che cf. De); Impf. :[[בְּשִׁפְלוּת יׇדַיִם יִדְלֽף הַבָּֽיִת]] Ec 10:18 the house drips, i.e. leaks, because cracks are not mended.
